Most cases result from new mutations in the gene and occur in people with no history of the disorder in their family.",GHR,pseudoachondroplasia
What are the treatments for pseudoachondroplasia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of pseudoachondroplasia:  - Gene Review: Gene Review:
